name: 01 Zombie Gore Sniper Shooter Game - Assassin Killing Hitman Shooting Games For Free
name_original: 01 Zombie Gore Sniper Shooter Game - Assassin Killing Hitman Shooting Games For Free
description:
Aim & Shoot! Kill the zombies and become a Master Hitman. Tilt the device to aim and Tap to shoot and kill.

- EASY CONTROLS (Tap to shoot)
- Awesome Graphics
- Multiple TARGETS!
- Improve your skills and accomplish EXTREME MISSIONS
- Compete against your friends

Don't miss a single Shot....or you will end up losing the game!

Download now and don't miss amazing updates!
